name: ZERO TO TEN - HARDCUBE GAME
description:
Complete 10 levels to finish the game.

If you die, you would start from the first level. 

Have some puzzle moments. 

Spacebar to jump, and A D to move. 

You can wall jump. 

Touch the blue telephone to travel in time. 

Avoid red cubes (yourself from the past) or you will die.

After time traveling your dimensions begin to be corrupt. 

Records:

Me 14 minutes 

My Brother 3:00:297.
